text: <extra_id_0> Jagged1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> belongs to the DSL family of ligands for Notch receptors that control the proliferation and differentiation of various cell lineages .
However , little is known about the transcription factors that regulate its expression .
Here , we show that <extra_id_0> Jagged1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is a Rel / NF-kappaB - responsive gene .
